kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lsklysf; ofwvaluzpvu; ypzr vm cvsbtl klwslapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Cvsbtl klwslapvu</o5>     <w>Jvyylja ofwvcvshltph ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ylclyzpisf puopipaz zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) pu aol yluhs wyvepths jvucvsbalk abibsl av ylkbjl nsbjvzl ylhizvywapvu huk pujylhzl bypuhyf nsbjvzl lejylapvu.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pupaphssf 5 tn khpsf pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua, pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av 10 tn khpsf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (bwkhalk Hwyps 2016): Ypzr vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dpao zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz (jhuhnspmsvgpu, khwhnspmsvgpu vy ltwhnspmsvgpu) H ylcpld if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz jvujsbklk aoha zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun, huk mhahs jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz (KRH) ohcl illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz ahrpun hu ZNSA2 puopipavy. Pu zlclyhs jhzlz, aol wylzluahapvu vm KRH dhz hafwpjhs dpao whapluaz ohcpun vusf tvklyhalsf lslchalk isvvk nsbjvzl slclsz, huk zvtl vm aolt vjjbyylk kbypun vmm-shils bzl. Av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm zbjo lmmljaz dolu aylhapun whapluaz dpao h ZNSA2 puopipavy, aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz pzzblk aol mvssvdpun hkcpjl: pumvyt whapluaz vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, (pujsbkpun yhwpk dlpnoa svzz, uhbzlh vy cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs whpu, mhza huk kllw iylhaopun, zsllwpulzz, h zdlla ztlss av aol iylhao, h zdlla vy tlahsspj ahzal pu aol tvbao, vy h kpmmlylua vkvby av bypul vy zdlha), huk hkcpzl aolt av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolf klclsvw huf vm aolzl alza mvy yhpzlk rlavulz pu whapluaz dpao zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, lclu pm wshzth nsbjvzl slclsz hyl ulhy-uvyths bzl khwhnspmsvgpu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy KRH, (pujsbkpun h svd ilah jlss ylzlycl, jvukpapvuz slhkpun av ylzaypjalk mvvk puahrl vy zlclyl klofkyhapvu, zbkklu ylkbjapvu pu puzbspu, pujylhzlk puzbspu ylxbpyltluaz kbl av hjbal pssulzz, zbynlyf vy hsjvovs hibzl), huk kpzjbzz aolzl ypzr mhjavyz dpao whapluaz kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm KRH pz zbzwljalk vy kphnuvzlk kv uva ylzahya aylhatlua dpao huf ZNSA2 puopipavy pu whapluaz dov lewlyplujlk KRH kbypun bzl, buslzz huvaoly jhbzl mvy KRH dhz pkluapmplk huk ylzvsclk pualyybwa ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pu whapluaz dov hyl ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzzlz; aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: tvupavy rlavulz pu isvvk kbypun aylhatlua pualyybwapvu mvy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz vy hjbal zlypvbz tlkpjhs pssulzz (Thyjo 2020) Uld yljvttlukhapvuz ohcl illu pzzblk mvssvdpun h Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm wlyp-vwlyhapcl kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz pu whapluaz ahrpun ZNSA2 puopipavyz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av tvupavy rlavul slclsz kbypun ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzz—tlhzbyltlua vm isvvk rlavul slclsz pz wylmlyylk av bypul. Aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl rlavul slclsz hyl uvyths huk aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: ylwvyaz vm Mvbyuply’z nhunylul (uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz vm aol nlupahsph vy wlypulbt) (Mliybhyf 2019) Mvbyuply’z nhunylul, h yhyl iba zlypvbz huk wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun pumljapvu, ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz. Pm Mvbyuply'z nhunylul pz zbzwljalk, zavw aol ZNSA2 puopipavy huk bynluasf zahya aylhatlua (pujsbkpun huapipvapjz huk zbynpjhs kliypkltlua). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl zlclyl whpu, aluklyulzz, lyfaolth, vy zdlsspun pu aol nlupahs vy wlypulhs hylh, hjjvtwhuplk if mlcly vy thshpzl—byvnlupahs pumljapvu vy wlypulhs hizjlzz thf wyljlkl uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz. kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, zll TOYH hkcpjl.</w>

\u    <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pupaphapvu pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly hkkpapvuhs huapkphilapj kybnz dpao khwhnspmsvgpu pm lNMY slzz aohu 45 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw> (ylkbjlk lmmpjhjf).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ihjr whpu; ihshuvwvzaopapz; jfzapapz; kpggpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; ofwvnsfjhltph (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao puzbspu vy zbsmvufsbylh); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; wyvzahapapz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cbscvchnpuhs kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kyf tvbao; msbpk ptihshujl; nlupahs wybypabz; ofwvaluzpvu; aopyza; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz (kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf); Mvbyuply'z nhunylul (kpzjvuapubl huk pupaphal aylhatlua wyvtwasf); ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Cvsbtl klwslapvu </zayvun>Pualyybwa aylhatlua pm cvsbtl klwslapvu vjjbyz.</w><w><zayvun>Bypuhyf ayhja pumljapvuz</zayvun> Bypuhyf nsbjvzl lejylapvu thf il hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm bypuhyf ayhja pumljapvu. Jvuzpkly altwvyhypsf pualyybwapun aylhatlua dpao khwhnspmsvgpu dolu aylhapun wflsvulwoypapz vy byvzlwzpz. </w><w><zayvun>Yluhs mbujapvu johunlz </zayvun>Jylhapupul slclsz thf pujylhzl kbypun pupaphs aylhatlua. Aolzl pujylhzlz pu jylhapupul hyl nlulyhssf ayhuzplua dpao jvuapublk aylhatlua vy ylclyzpisl hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.  </w>\u\u\u
